[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The Online Trading and Investment System (OTIS) enables users to manage investments, track retirement savings, and make informed trading decisions.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: OTIS supports stock trading, portfolio management, financial planning, and real-time investment tracking.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: OTIS integrates with payment gateways, delivery services, and financial systems.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: OTIS offers web and mobile UIs for users and admins.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: OTIS supports desktops, laptops, and mobile devices for accessing the system.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: OTIS uses REST APIs for integration with stock exchanges and financial institutions.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.5 Communications Interfa: OTIS sends notifications via email, SMS, and in-app for updates.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Memory Constraints: OTIS optimizes storage for user data, transactions, and investment information.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: OTIS supports order creation, payment, and real-time delivery tracking.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: OTIS customizes notifications and interfaces based on user roles and preferences.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: OTIS integrates with third-party systems for payment and order tracking.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: OTIS lets users browse, trade stocks, track investments, manage payments, and set up plans.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: OTIS serves customers, traders, administrators, and financial advisors.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: OTIS requires internet for trading, portfolio management, and real-time stock tracking.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: OTIS depends on external payment processors, stock exchanges, and financial data systems.
[SUBSEC] 1.8 Definitions: Order: Request to buy or sell.

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall let users place orders and manage preferences.
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall integrate with external payment processors and financial data systems.

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The system shall let users browse stocks, place orders, track performance, and select preferences. (REQ-INTF-001, REQ-DB-001)
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall provide secure payment processing and real-time stock updates. (REQ-INTF-002, REQ-DB-001)
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-003: The system shall generate order confirmations and track stock statuses in real-time. (REQ-INTF-002, REQ-DB-001)

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The system shall provide an intuitive UI for stock trading and portfolio management.
[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-002: The system shall let users save payment and shipping details for faster checkout.

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall provide real-time updates on stock prices and account status without significant delay.

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall securely store user account information, transaction history, and investment data.

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall ensure secure user authentication and data storage.

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall comply with GDPR and data protection regulations for financial data.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall ensure encrypted communication for secure financial transactions.

[SEC] 3. Verification: Test order creation, payment, and stock tracking.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: User guides, API docs, and setup instructions.
[SEC] 5. References: E-commerce best practices, financial standards, and GDPR compliance.
